_AttachExtendedSealedFileEvidenceText: Scrive sealed the document with a keyless digital signature.
_AttachGuardtimeSealedFileEvidenceText: Scrive sealed the document with a digital signature.
_AttachSealedFileEvidenceText: The verification page, evidence log, evidence of intent, evidence documentation and digital signature documentation were appended to the document by Scrive.
_AuthorUsesCSVEvidenceText: The signing process was started by Scrive using the mass signing feature.
_CancelDocumenElegEvidenceText: Scrive withdrew the invitation to sign since the identity information for $signatory$ did not match the information received from the e-ID provider.$if(full)$ Reason given by the e-ID provider: $msg$.$endif$
_CancelDocumentEvidenceText: The invitation to sign was withdrawn$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.
_ChangeSignatoryEmailWhenUndeliveredEvid: The email address for the signatory was changed from $oldemail$ to $newemail$ by $actor$.
_ChangeSignatoryPhoneWhenUndeliveredEvid: The phone number for the signatory was changed from $oldphone$ to $newphone$ by $actor$.
_CloseDocumentEvidenceText: Scrive locked the document before sealing it with a digital signature.
_DeleteSigAttachmentEvidenceText: The attachment with the name "$name$" was deleted by $actor$.
_ErrorDocumentEvidenceText: The following error occurred: $errmsg$. The signing process was cancelled by Scrive.
_InvitationDeliveredByEmailText: An invitation to $_view_or_sign()$ was delivered$if(!archive)$ to $signatory$$endif$ by email.
_InvitationDeliveredBySMSText: An invitation to $_view_or_sign()$ was delivered$if(!archive)$ to $signatory$$endif$ by SMS.
_InvitationEvidenceText:
Scrive sent an invitation to $_view_or_sign()$ to $signatory$$_delivery_method()$. The invitation included a link that when clicked lead to the online signing page powered by Scrive.$if(text)$ The invitation contained the following message:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_InvitationUndeliveredByEmailText: Scrive´s external email delivery system reported that the invitation$if(!archive)$ to $signatory$$endif$ could not be delivered and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredBySMSText: Scrive´s external SMS delivery system reported that the invitation$if(!archive)$ to $signatory$$endif$ could not be delivered and continued attempts were cancelled.
_MarkInvitationReadEvidenceText: Scrive´s notification system reported that the invitation to $_view_or_sign()$ (sent to $email$) was opened.
_PreparationToPendingEvidenceText: The editing of the document was finalised$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$, and Scrive locked the document from editing.$if(full)$ The language was set to $lang$, and the signing due date was set to $timeouttime$ UTC.$if(timezone)$ The time zone $timezone$ was provided by $actor$.$endif$$endif$
_ProlongDocumentEvidenceText: The due date for signing was prolonged$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.
_RejectDocumentEvidenceText:
The invitation to sign was rejected$if(!archive)$by $actor$$endif$ and the signing process was cancelled by Scrive.$if(text)$ The rejection message was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_ReminderSendText:
A reminder to sign was sent to $signatory$ by the Scrive system$_delivery_method()$.$if(full)$ The Scrive system reset the delivery status details (sent/received/read invitation/read online).$endif$$if(text)$ The reminder message was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_RemovedFromPadDeviceText: In person signing for signatory ($signatory$) was withdrawn by $actor$.
_ResealedPDFText: The document was sealed by $if(!archive)$$actor$, $endif$an authorized Scrive administrator.
_RestartDocumentEvidenceText: The document was restarted$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$ and Scrive opened the document for editing.
_SaveSigAttachmentEvidenceText: The attachment with the name "$name$" was uploaded by $actor$.
_SendToPadDeviceText: The signing invitation for signatory ($signatory$) was set to "in person signing". In person signing does not prompt any signing invitation to be sent.
_SetDocumentInviteTimeEvidenceText: The signing process was started by $actor$.
_SetELegAuthenticationMethodEvidenceText: e-ID authentication method for signatories to sign was required by $actor$.
_SetStandardAuthenticationMethodEvidence: No additional authentication method for signatories to sign was required by $actor$.
_SignDocumentEvidenceText:
The document was signed$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$$_identification_method()$.$if(eleg)$$if(full)$

The text signed in the e-legitimation client was: 

$infotext$

E-legitimation provider: $provider$.

$if(fieldsverified)$

Information about signatory verified by $provider$: $if(fstnameverified)$ First name; $endif$ $if(lstnameverified)$ Last name; $endif$ $if(persnumverified)$ Personal number; $endif$

$endif$

Signature:

$signature$

$if(certificate)$

Certificate:

$certificate$

$endif$ $if(ocsp)$

Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) Response:

$ocsp$

$endif$$endif$$endif$
_SignatoryLinkVisitedText: The sign view was opened$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.
_TimeoutDocumentEvidenceText: The due date for signing the document passed. The possibility to sign was disabled by Scrive.
